I'm char

I'm an engineer. I'm a contortionist. I'm a plant enthusiast. I got a lot of little projects all over the place. I like to do all my favorite things always.

About Me

Worked as an epitaxy engineer. Ran away to join the circus. Wanted to find a certain kind of mental stimulation and found myself in software. Juggles complaints from housemates about "too many plants" -whatever that means. Went to UIUC. Aloft. Flatiron. I'm a sort of forever-student.
